game_description: Dig and find freedom through old mine, while running away from bloodthirsty horde of monsters, which is chasing you. But be on lookout! You will have to take care of all 5 bombs prepared for destroying the mine. Features: - Easy touch control - 3D cube world - Challenging horor puzzle game - Find a way how to resist monster attacks - Figure out how to survive with limited supplies - Whole New horror story - Awesome feeling with headphones What should you do with the mine? What is running out? Simply taken, the mine was supposed to be destroyed and backfilled already. What went wrong with such a simple thing?
review_1: The consept is good, but the game play is horrible
review_2: I like the new features in this game like new creatures and can swing the axe as fast as u want and the level keeps changing when u get i higher level ind it got a littl more scary
